Hello there!

First off, welcome to the group! I hope you enjoy coming back=
 here.

Second, about the factions... I originally thought that, each
indiv=
idual in any setting having their own idea about how things
should be, it m=
ade sense that not all Maximals and not all Predacons
would quite get along=
 together. Pacificus think it's better to do the
cience and aim for peace t=
hrough that rather than policing the world
as the Silver Wings do. It's jus=
t that kind of logic and I think it
shows more accurately the different sha=
des of gray there. Besides,
it's more opportunities for different kinds of =
characters!

I hope that answers your question! =3D)

mals and Predicons. The Autobots

ace through tyranny!" or "Might makes

riations on each theme.

preserving the peace will allow them to grow strong for

ile they still have before the Minions start an all-out

ader is Spire. And IRON SKULL PREDACONS who believe
that

 weak and they would rather take over the lead from the

act right now. Their leader is Jotunn.

wo versions of Maximal: PACIFICUS
MAXIMALSwho

he only way everybody can focus on the
efforts

heir leader is Perseus. While you also

that they want to prepare a strike
against

ld take them all out before things get

wing.

ximals but

action is

 and
swift,

ls also

in the

e Minions of Unicron, generally called either
Minions

 Their apparent goal is to turn the Earth into a ripe

for Unicron. Unicron realizing that the energon
present

p an eye on Earth until the crystals were ripe for his

ber how the crystals originally interfered with

 and they couldn't stay in robot mode?) Up until

ddition of several new warriors this cold war
